name: FrankenHeart
description:
Why bother waiting for someone to ask you to the Halloween Dance when you can just make your own date? 
There are only a few things you'll need:

- a secret lab

- spare body parts

and 

- your sister's teen magazine to find out who you'd match with the best

With these things combined, you'll either end up summoning demons or creating the love of your life!

Warnings: character death, blood

Contact: If you make any fanart, playthroughs, cosplays, etc. for my game please show me! If you want to translate the game into another language, have any bugs or message me about professional things, please email me.

@jadedkidme_art (instagram)

@jadedkidme (twitter)

jadedkidmeart@gmail.com (email)

I made this game specifically for the Spooktober 4th Annual Visual Novel Jam! I wrote, programmed, and drew the entire thing as well. I had never used renpy before, so please be mindful of any poor visuals,, It was tough, but I managed to finish in time!
